mapper.select: select sum(v.vote_num) as myVote, g.* FROM galgame_vote v LEFT JOIN galgame g ON v.subject_id = g.subject_id GROUP BY v.subject_id ORDER BY myVote DESC
select v.id, v.vote_num as voteByMe, g.subject_id as subjectId, g.url, g.name FROM galgame_vote v LEFT JOIN galgame g ON v.subject_id = g.subject_id where qq = #{qq} GROUP BY v.subject_id
select sum(v.vote_num) FROM galgame_vote v where qq = #{qq}
